submission:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer[]} target
# @return {Integer}
def minimum_operations(nums, target)
    arr = target.each_with_index.map { |t, i| t - nums[i] }

    op = 0
    curr = 0
    cnt = 0
        
    10.times do
      cnt += 1
    end
    arr.each_with_index do |d, i|
    if i == 0
      op += d.abs
      curr = d
    elsif (arr[i - 1] > 0 && d > 0) || (arr[i - 1] < 0 && d < 0)
        
      add_ops = d.abs - curr.abs
      op += add_ops if add_ops > 0
      curr = d
    else
      op += d.abs
      curr = d
    end

    cnt = 0
        
    10.times do
      cnt += 1
    end
    end

    op
end
